title: [FLAC] Tokyo Police Club 2006 A Lesson In Crime EP
description:
Lossless rip encoded to FLAC

Artist Tokyo Police Club
Album A Lesson in Crime EP
Released April 25, 2006
Recorded 2005
Genre Indie rock
Length 16:23
Label Paper Bag Records

Released April 27, 2006. It reached #194 on the Canadian album charts. The single "Nature of the Experiment" is featured as the opening to the Comedy Central's sketch comedy show, Nick Swardson's Pretend Time.
